title: Revenue Management for Bed and Breakfasts
description: Simplify pricing with our revenue management software for small hotels and bed and breakfasts: save time, increase revenue and stay in control of your prices.
content: ## Thesmartest revenue management softwaresmall hotels and Bed & Breakfast Make the most from your rooms using automated pricing with RoomPriceGenie revenue management software for small hotels.Whatever your level of technical ability, you can save time, make more revenue and still have full control of your prices. ## Thesmartest revenue management softwaresmall hotels and Bed & Breakfast Make the most from your rooms using automated pricing with RoomPriceGenie revenue management software for small hotels.Whatever your level of technical ability, you can save time, make more revenue and still have full control of your prices. ## No revenue management experience?No problem! RoomPriceGenie gives you price recommendations that you understand and can control. ## Howrevenue managementbenefits small properties& B&Bs Running a small hotel or B&B often means doing it all yourself. You don’t have time to track the competition, monitor booking trends, or tweak rates every day. But pricing still has a big impact on your bottom line. Withrevenue management software for small hotels, you can finally take pricing off your plate without losing control. RoomPriceGenie works in the background to adjust your prices automatically throughout the day. You set the rules, we do the rest. Here’s how it helps: Your prices respond instantly to changes in demand: local events, last-minute bookings, or slow periods. This means more competitive rates, fewer gaps, and higher income without needing to watch the market yourself. Plan ahead with confidence. Ourhotel rate calendarshows exactly what you’re charging each day and why. Want to adjust a specific weekend or holiday? It takes just a click. Avoid inefficient one-night bookings during peak periods. You can set minimum stay lengths (orminLOS) that adapt to seasonality or booking pace, helping you maximize revenue and reduce turnaround time. Ourrevenue management software for small hotelsis made for owners who don’t want to become revenue managers. There’s no complicated setup, and no need to check it daily. You stay in control and you save hours every week. If bookings spike suddenly, your prices increase too. Whether it’s a concert in town or a long weekend rush, your rooms won’t sell out too early or too cheap with RoomPriceGenie’ssurge protection. ## Why small hotels need automated pricing software When you’re running a small hotel or B&B, time is limited and pricing often gets pushed down the list. But your room rates are one of the biggest levers you have to grow revenue. And the results speak for themselves. In a recentstudy of 567 properties using RoomPriceGenie, small businesses like yours saw measurable improvements: - Rooms were filled more often, with an average 14% increase in occupancy - Earnings per booking improved, with a 4% lift in average daily rate (ADR) - Overall, those properties earned an average of 19% more revenue—just by pricing more accurately, more often And no, you don’t need to hire a revenue manager or spend your evenings adjusting calendars. Our software handles the updates in the background, reacting to shifts in demand automatically—while still giving you full control over rules and limits. You’re the one who knows your guests and your property best. But with RoomPriceGenie’srevenue management software for small hotelshandling pricing behind the scenes, you’ll have more time to focus on delivering a great experience and more income to show for it. ## Why chooseRoomPriceGenie? Learn more about how we can help you save time and increase revenue in a way that you will always feel comfortable with. Automation means your prices will adapt to changes in demand and supply much sooner than you could change them yourself. Each week, you save 10 hours of manual work so that you can focus more on what makes your hotel special. RoomPriceGenie has the best-in-class recommendation score on Hotel Tech Report. ## RoomPriceGenie works seamlessly with your existing solution With 70 integrations and counting—unleash the power of technology by connecting RoomPriceGenie to your PMS or your Channel Manager. Our autopilot integration means your pricing is always kept up-to-date, while you are busy doing other things. ## Trusted by over 4,000hoteliers around the world Grindelwald, Switzerland ## Jürg ## Hotel owner Bristol, United Kingdom ## Charlie &Toby ## Apartment owner “Simple to understand, automated pricing, resulting in the best possible room rate.” Hotel Alpenblick in Grindelwald, Switzerland Paris, France ## Massiva &Emmanuel ## Hotel owner “Simple to understand, automated pricing, resulting in the best possible room rate.” Hotel Alpenblick in Grindelwald, Switzerland ## Meet one of ourrevenue managers Speak to us to learn how we can help you. In a 20-minute call we will discuss: - Your current situation and needs - Our approach to pricing automation - Your individual solution to bring your business to the next level ##
